description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Annals of Garelochside. Being an account historical and topographical of the parishes of Row, Rosneath, and Cardross ... With illustrations, etc" Author: MAUGHAN, William Charles. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10370.ee.37." Page: 241 Place of Publishing: Paisley Date of Publishing: 1897 Publisher: A. Gardner Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002427874 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
